resources.string:
This day for us is special
 A time beyond compare
 The joy we feel deep in our hearts
 We hope you will come and share
 Your presence there with us
 Means more than words can say
 Please try to be there
 To celebrate this special day

 #MegHith
Rakshith Shankar T R\n &\n Meghana N U

Mrs.Nagamani H S and Mr.Ravi kumar G S
&
Mrs.Uma D and late Mr.Nagaraj H P
request the honor of your presence
 at the marriage of

"Venue:
Are you in GREEN zone?
Lions Club (Community Hall)
New town, Bhadravathi
Karnataka 577301"
